verses.text: My \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, if thou wilt \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* my \w words|strong="H0561"\w*, and \w hide|strong="H6845"\w* my \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* with thee;

So that thou \w incline|strong="H7181"\w* thine \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* unto \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, \add and\add* \w apply|strong="H5186"\w* thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* to \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w*;

Yea, if thou \w criest|strong="H7121"\w* after \w knowledge|strong="H0998"\w*, \add and\add* liftest \w up|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* for \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w*;\f + \fr 2.3 \ft liftest…: Heb. givest thy voice\f*
If thou \w seekest|strong="H1245"\w* her as \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and \w searchest|strong="H2664"\w* for her as \add for\add* hid \w treasures|strong="H4301"\w*;

Then shalt thou \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* the \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w find|strong="H4672"\w* the \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*: out of his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \add cometh\add* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* and \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w*.

He layeth \w up|strong="H6845"\w* sound \w wisdom|strong="H8454"\w* for the \w righteous|strong="H3477"\w*: \add he is\add* a \w buckler|strong="H4043"\w* to them that \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w uprightly|strong="H8537"\w*.
He \w keepeth|strong="H5341"\w* the \w paths|strong="H0734"\w* of \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, and \w preserveth|strong="H8104"\w* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of his \w saints|strong="H2623"\w*.

Then shalt thou \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, and \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, and \w equity|strong="H4339"\w*; \add yea\add*, every \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w path|strong="H4570"\w*.

¶ When \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \w entereth|strong="H0935"\w* into thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, and \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* is \w pleasant|strong="H5276"\w* unto thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*;
\w Discretion|strong="H4209"\w* shall \w preserve|strong="H8104"\w* thee, \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w* shall \w keep|strong="H5341"\w* thee:

To \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* thee from the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \add man\add*, from the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that \w speaketh|strong="H1696"\w* froward \w things|strong="H8419"\w*;
Who \w leave|strong="H5800"\w* the \w paths|strong="H0734"\w* of \w uprightness|strong="H3476"\w*, to \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in the \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* of \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*;

Who \w rejoice|strong="H8056"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, \add and\add* \w delight|strong="H1523"\w* in the \w frowardness|strong="H8419"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w*;
Whose \w ways|strong="H0734"\w* \add are\add* \w crooked|strong="H6141"\w*, and \add they\add* \w froward|strong="H3868"\w* in their \w paths|strong="H4570"\w*:

To \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* thee from the \w strange|strong="H2114"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, \add even\add* from the \w stranger|strong="H5237"\w* \add which\add* \w flattereth|strong="H2505"\w* with her \w words|strong="H0561"\w*;

Which \w forsaketh|strong="H5800"\w* the \w guide|strong="H0441"\w* of her \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*, and \w forgetteth|strong="H7911"\w* the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of her \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
For her \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w inclineth|strong="H7743"\w* unto \w death|strong="H4194"\w*, and her \w paths|strong="H4570"\w* unto the \w dead|strong="H7496"\w*.
None that \w go|strong="H0935"\w* unto her return \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, neither take they \w hold|strong="H5381"\w* of the \w paths|strong="H0734"\w* of \w life|strong="H2416"\w*.

That thou mayest \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \add men\add*, and \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w paths|strong="H0734"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*.
For the \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* shall \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and the \w perfect|strong="H8549"\w* shall \w remain|strong="H3498"\w* in it.

But the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* shall be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and the \w transgressors|strong="H0898"\w* shall be rooted \w out|strong="H5255"\w* of it.\f + \fr 2.22 \ft rooted: or, plucked up\f*
